Name: Base Station License, Keshet Car Service Ltd., Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Keshet Car Service Ltd., submitted as Keshet Car Service, Ltd., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Keshet Car Service Ltd., submitted as Keshet Car Service, Ltd., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 4504 Fort Hamilton Parkway in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#775
07/23/98
